content: **mosaic zig zag bag crochet pattern** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this pattern the mosaic zig zag bag is super fun to crochet and also super practical they make great gifts for yourself or anyone on your list i hope you love this pattern and have fun crocheting these bags in every color this pattern is intermediate-beginner friendly you ll find a video tutorial on my youtube channel that goes with the written pattern to show everything visually and explain the mosaic crochet portion of the pattern this pattern includes -written instructions with photos and link to the video tutorial -instructions for one bag size -graph for the mosaic crochet zig zag section -instructions to make your own custom bag size and how to adapt the graph -instructions and a video link to help you sew on a zipper -instructions and a video link to help you line your bag materials worsted weight #4 yarn 4 mm crochet hook yarn needle zipper i used a 7-inch zipper but you could use any length depending on the size of bag you are making it s easy to cut a longer zipper if you don t need the whole length optional if you d like to line your bag you ll need some fabric you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
